metadataAttributes.Title: Construction Project Management
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Construction Project Management introduces learners to Project Initiation and Planning. Columbia University professor, Ibrahim Odeh, along with industry experts join together to provide a comprehensive overview of the construction industry. There are 10 modules that allow learners to become knowledgeable of construction management within the dynamic construction industry.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Project Management,Construction Management,Work Breakdown Structure,Project Planning,
